item.title: Imagemagick
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Convert Command imagemagick convert rose.jpg -resize 50% rose.png convert pngs to gif with 2 second per frame convert -delay 200 *.png converted.gif

item.title: Alfred Notes
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Use node on alfred workflow node<<-"code" // your code here // e.g. console.log("hello world"); code iTerm2 Integration curl --silent 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stuartcryan/custom-iterm-applescripts-for-alfred/master/custom_iterm_script_iterm_2.9.applescript' | pbcopy stuartcryan/custom-iterm-applescripts-for-alfred: Custom iTerm Applescripts for Alfred

item.title: Programming Concept
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Links How to make your code self-documenting? | CodeUtopia Separation of concerns - Wikipedia Garbage in, garbage out - Wikiwand leesei’s choice Naming 寫出黎就要俾名，俾名啲concept 就清楚，code 亦自然清楚 leesei What can I learn right now in just 10 minutes that could be useful for the rest of my programming career? That programming is about solving problems, not writing code. Here are the four basic tasks that an individual programmer must perform.
